sentences.en: He had only untutored strength like a bull in a china shop.
sentences.cn: 他只有一身的蛮力,干事笨手笨脚的.

sentences.en: It is good to see wisdom from an untutored barbarian.
sentences.cn: 真是非常高兴看到无知的野蛮人终于也展现出一点点的智慧了.

sentences.en: Oliver envied the fine person and dignified manners of his untutored brother.
sentences.cn: 奥利佛非常妒忌他这个没受过教育的弟弟长得竟这么好,举止又落落大方.

sentences.en: She has put into the small, unwise head of the chipmunk the untutored fear of poisons.
sentences.cn: 花栗鼠愚蠢的小脑袋里却有天生的对于毒药的恐惧.

sentences.en: That she might think me untutored youth.
sentences.cn: 让她认为我是个无知的孩子.

sentences.en: The selfish comes from the childish and untutored thought and body.
sentences.cn: 自私源于身体或思想的幼稚和无知.

sentences.en: They had left school at fifteen and were quite untutored in writing.
sentences.cn: 他们15岁就辍学了，几乎未接受过正式的写作训练。

sentences.en: This untutored mathematician had an obsession with numbers.
sentences.cn: 这位非科班出身的数学家对数字特别痴迷。

sentences.en: To my untutored ear, your voice sounds almost professional.
sentences.cn: 照我这外行人听来, 你的嗓音差不多够专业水平了.

sentences.en: To the untutored eye , the British flag may look like it could be hung either way.
sentences.cn: 在不明就里的人看来, 英国国旗正着和倒着挂没什么不一样.

words.tran_cn: 未受教育的；粗野的；天真的

trans.tran_cn: 未受教育的，粗野的，幼稚的，与教育无关的
trans.tran_en: not having been taught to do something
